participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Adventurous and creative, enjoys spending time with her dogs and exploring new activities.
participant_1.background: i compete in dog agility classes. i went to school for chemistry but work in a bookstore. i do not care about fashion. i hate the color orange. i dance on the weekends.

participant_2.name: Michael
participant_2.personality: Nurturing and responsible, always planning ahead for his growing family.
participant_2.background: i am expecting twins in two months. i already have children. i just bought my first home. i work at a bank.
